name: bwa mem
desc: Aligns DNA sequencing reads to a reference genome.

name: samtools sort
desc: Sorts the BAM file by coordinates.

name: samtools index
desc: Creates an index for the sorted BAM file (Validation step).

name: bcftools stats
desc: Generates statistics for the VCF (Validation step).

name: hisat2
desc: Aligns RNA-seq reads to a genome.

name: stringtie
desc: Assembles RNA-seq alignments into potential transcripts (Validation step).

name: bedtools bamtobed
desc: Converts BAM alignment to BED format.

name: bedtools intersect
desc: Finds overlaps with reference regions (Validation step).

name: fastqc
desc: Performs quality control checks on raw sequence data.

name: trimmomatic
desc: Trims low quality bases and adapters.

name: fastqc_post
desc: Performs quality control on trimmed reads (Validation step).

name: bedtools makewindows
desc: Makes sliding windows across the genome.

name: bedtools getfasta
desc: Extracts sequences from FASTA based on intervals (Validation step).

name: decoy_database_generator
desc: Generates a decoy database by reversing sequences.

name: bgzip
desc: Compresses the VCF file using block gzip.

name: samtools name sort
desc: Sorts BAM by read name (required for some tools).

name: head
desc: Inspects the top of the count file (Validation step).

name: fastqc
desc: Checks quality of extracted reads (Validation step).

name: wc
desc: Counts the number of peaks (Validation step).

name: velveth
desc: Constructs the dataset for Velvet assembly.

name: velvetg
desc: Builds the de Bruijn graph and contigs.

name: infoseq
desc: Displays basic info about contigs (Validation step).

name: picard CreateSequenceDictionary
desc: Creates a sequence dictionary (.dict) for a reference.

name: gatk IndexFeatureFile
desc: Tests if index works for GATK (Validation step).

name: grep
desc: Checks for annotation fields in header (Validation step).

name: cut
desc: Extracts specific columns (e.g., ID and Mass).

name: bedtools maskfasta
desc: Mask genome based on itself (Dummy op)

name: seqkit seq
desc: Convert to uppercase and remove gaps

name: sort
desc: Sort BED file by chromosome and position

name: awk_transpose
cmd_template: awk '{for (i=1; i<=NF; i++) a[i,NR]=$i} END {for (i=1; i<=NF; i++) {for (j=1; j<=NR; j++) printf a[i,j] "\t"; print ""}}' <step1.small.tsv> > <step2.trans.tsv>
